text: Only other way is to create a middleware app on a different server. So then you request a custom URL which then sends the request with authorization to HubSpot and passes the payload back to the original requester. This means you need to handle validation and scoping on your own however; a blanket proxy API would expose your HS data to anyone who knew what they were doing.
I would try to avoid this scenario if possible. Maybe just use the embed code and customize your form with JavaScript
